front.title: Suite B Profile for Datagram Transport Layer Security / Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (DTLS-SRTP)

abstract.t: The United States government has published guidelines for "NSA Suite B Cryptography", which defines cryptographic algorithm policy for national security applications. This document describes the use of Suite B cryptography with the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocol, the Secure Real-Time Transport Protocol (SRTP), and the Secure Real-Time Transport Control Protocol (SRTCP) to provide a robust architecture for securing real-time data.
